scholarships.name: Gates Scholarship
scholarships.description: Full-ride scholarship for exceptional minority students with significant financial need. For incoming undergraduate freshmen who are Pell-eligible minority students (African American, American Indian/Alaska Native, Asian Pacific Islander American, Hispanic American).

scholarships.name: Jack Kent Cooke Foundation Scholarship
scholarships.description: Supports high-achieving students with financial need. For high school seniors with GPA 3.5+ and family income up to $95,000.

scholarships.name: Coca-Cola Scholars Program
scholarships.description: Merit-based scholarship for community leaders. For high school seniors with minimum 3.0 GPA and demonstrated leadership.

scholarships.name: Davidson Fellows Scholarship
scholarships.description: Awards for students who complete significant projects in STEM, literature, music, or philosophy. For students 18 and under who have completed a significant piece of work.

scholarships.name: SMART Scholarship
scholarships.description: Full scholarship for STEM students in exchange for DoD service. For undergraduate and graduate STEM majors with U.S. citizenship and commitment to DoD employment. Includes full tuition plus stipend.

scholarships.name: Ron Brown Scholar Program
scholarships.description: Scholarship for African American students demonstrating leadership. For high school seniors showing academic excellence and community service.

scholarships.name: Hispanic Scholarship Fund
scholarships.description: Supporting Hispanic American students. For undergraduate and graduate students with Hispanic heritage and minimum 3.0 GPA.

scholarships.name: Dell Scholars Program
scholarships.description: Supports students who overcome adversity. For high school seniors who participated in approved college readiness program, have 2.4 GPA minimum, and are Pell-eligible.

scholarships.name: Flinn Scholars Program
scholarships.description: Arizona's premier merit scholarship. For high school seniors who are Arizona residents attending Arizona State, University of Arizona, or Northern Arizona University. Includes full tuition, stipend, and study abroad.

scholarships.name: QuestBridge National College Match
scholarships.description: Matches high-achieving, low-income students with full scholarships. For high school seniors with family income typically under $65,000 and top academic performance.

scholarships.name: Elks National Foundation Most Valuable Student
scholarships.description: Merit-based scholarship recognizing leadership and academic achievement. For high school seniors with U.S. citizenship, leadership experience, and financial need.

scholarships.name: Burger King Scholars Program
scholarships.description: For students in the U.S., Canada, and Puerto Rico. For high school seniors with 2.5 GPA minimum, work experience preferred.

scholarships.name: AXA Achievement Scholarship
scholarships.description: For students who demonstrate ambition and drive. For high school seniors with demonstrated achievement in school, community, or workplace.

scholarships.name: UNCF Scholarships
scholarships.description: Various scholarships for African American students. For undergraduate and graduate students, specific requirements vary by scholarship.

scholarships.name: Women Techmakers Scholars Program
scholarships.description: Supporting women in computing and technology. For undergraduate and graduate women pursuing computer science or related field.

scholarships.name: APIA Scholarship
scholarships.sponsor: Asian & Pacific Islander American Scholarship Fund
scholarships.description: For Asian American and Pacific Islander students. For undergraduate and graduate students with Asian/Pacific Islander heritage, 2.7 GPA minimum, and U.S. citizenship or permanent resident status.

scholarships.name: Point Foundation Scholarship
scholarships.description: Supporting LGBTQ students. For undergraduate and graduate LGBTQ students with demonstrated leadership.

scholarships.name: National Merit Scholarship
scholarships.description: Based on PSAT/NMSQT performance. For high school juniors with high PSAT scores and U.S. citizenship or permanent resident status.

scholarships.name: Dream.US National Scholarship
scholarships.description: Largest scholarship program for DREAMers. For high school seniors and community college graduates who are DACA eligible with significant financial need.

scholarships.name: Foot Locker Scholar Athletes Program
scholarships.description: For student-athletes with financial need. For high school seniors who participate in high school or community-based sports with 3.0 GPA minimum.

scholarships.name: Scholastic Art & Writing Awards
scholarships.description: For creative teens in visual arts and writing. For students in grades 7-12 who submit original artwork or writing.

scholarships.name: Doodle for Google
scholarships.description: Annual art competition for K-12 students. Create a Google Doodle based on annual theme. Includes college scholarship and tech package.

scholarships.name: NSHSS Foundation Scholarships
scholarships.sponsor: National Society of High School Scholars
scholarships.description: Various scholarships for high-achieving students. For high school students with NSHSS membership, requirements vary by specific scholarship.

scholarships.name: NCWIT Award for Aspirations in Computing
scholarships.description: Recognizing young women in computing. For high school girls with interest in computing/technology and leadership experience.

scholarships.name: Voice of Democracy Scholarship
scholarships.description: Audio essay competition on patriotic theme. For students in grades 9-12 who record a 3-5 minute audio essay.

scholarships.name: Young Naturalist Awards
scholarships.description: For original science research essays. For students in grades 7-12 who submit original research-based essay.

scholarships.name: NACA Regional Council Student Leader Scholarships
scholarships.description: For student leaders involved in activities. For high school juniors and seniors with leadership in student activities or government.

scholarships.name: Best Buy @15 Scholarship
scholarships.description: For students who use technology to help their community. For students in grades 9-12 with 2.5 GPA and use of technology for community service.

scholarships.name: Siemens Competition
scholarships.description: For outstanding research projects in STEM. For high school students with original research in math, science, or engineering.

scholarships.name: The Carson Scholars Fund
scholarships.description: For students who excel academically and in community service. For students in grades 4-11 with 3.75 GPA minimum and humanitarian qualities.

scholarships.name: Gloria Barron Prize for Young Heroes
scholarships.description: For young leaders making positive change. For ages 8-18 with significant service to people or the environment.

scholarships.name: NFIB Young Entrepreneur Awards
scholarships.description: For young entrepreneurs with their own business. For high school students who own and operate a small business.
